reviewText:
If you want are REAL DVD
DO NOT GET THIS PIX!

Alpha DVD is a BURN!!!
this is not a silver disc
IT IS A BLUE BURNED DISC AND THERE IS NO MENTION OF THIS FACT!!

if I'd known that I'd not have picked up this disc
Decent quality for such a rare film.

Although I wanted to purchase THE LADY AND THE BANDIT. This is the same story only in silent film.
It is worth having in your library a true love, action and adventure story.
Great Product - Great Servic
Thank you
